summary: netfilter: nf_tables: release flow rule object from commit path
details:
netfilter: nf_tables: release flow rule object from commit path

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.78 by commit 6044791b7be707fd0e709f26e961a446424e5051, it was introduced in version v5.15.47 by commit e33d9bd563e71f6c6528b96008d65524a459c4dc. For more details please see the references link.
